price: N’aba Thamudu, abantu ba Lutwi ndetse n’aba Ayikat (b’i Madiyani), bose bari udutsiko.
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
